00069 #define rthal_spin_lock_irq(lock) \
00070 do {  \
00071     rthal_local_irq_disable(); \
00072     rthal_spin_lock(lock); \
00073 } while(0)
00074 
00075 #define rthal_spin_unlock_irq(lock) \
00076 do {  \
00077     rthal_spin_unlock(lock); \
00078     rthal_local_irq_enable(); \
00079 } while(0)
00080 
00081 #define rthal_spin_lock_irqsave(lock,x) \
00082 do {  \
00083     rthal_local_irq_save(x); \
00084     rthal_spin_lock(lock); \
00085 } while(0)

00088 do {  \

00090     rthal_local_irq_restore(x); \

00132 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_EVENT(hdlr) \
00133 static void hdlr (adevinfo_t *p) \
00134 { \
00135     if (do_##hdlr((p)->event,(p)->domid,(p)->evdata))   \
00136         adeos_propagate_event(p); \
00137 }
00138 
00139 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_SCHEDULE_EVENT(hdlr) \
00140 static void hdlr (adevinfo_t *p) \
00141 { \
00142     struct { \
00143         struct task_struct *prev; \
00144         struct task_struct *next; \
00145     } *ev = (__typeof(ev))(p)->evdata; \
00146     do_##hdlr(ev->next);        \
00147     adeos_propagate_event(p); \
00148 }
00149 
00150 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_SETSCHED_EVENT(hdlr) \
00151 static void hdlr (adevinfo_t *p) \
00152 { \
00153     struct { \
00154         struct task_struct *task; \
00155         int policy; \
00156         struct sched_param *param; \
00157     } *ev = (__typeof(ev))(p)->evdata; \
00158     do_##hdlr(ev->task,ev->param->sched_priority);      \
00159     adeos_propagate_event(p); \
00160 }
00161 
00162 #define RTHAL_DECLARE_SIGWAKE_EVENT(hdlr) \
00163 static void hdlr (adevinfo_t *p) \
00164 { \
00165     struct { \
00166         struct task_struct *task; \
00167     } *ev = (__typeof(ev))(p)->evdata; \
00168     do_##hdlr(ev->task);        \
00169     adeos_propagate_event(p); \
00170 }

00189 #define rthal_register_domain(_dom,_name,_id,_prio,_entry)      \
00190  ({     \
00191     adattr_t attr; \
00192     adeos_init_attr(&attr); \
00193     attr.name = _name;      \
00194     attr.entry = _entry;   \
00195     attr.domid = _id;       \
00196     attr.priority = _prio; \
00197     adeos_register_domain(_dom,&attr); \
00198  })
